recaptcha.client package¶

Submodules¶

recaptcha.client.captcha module¶

class recaptcha.client.captcha.RecaptchaResponse(is_valid, error_code=None)¶

Bases: object

recaptcha.client.captcha.get_display_html(site_key, use_ssl=False, error=None, lang='en')¶

Gets the HTML to display for reCAPTCHA

site_key – The public api key use_ssl – Should the request be sent over ssl? error – An error message to display (from RecaptchaResponse.error_code)

recaptcha.client.captcha.submit(recaptcha_response)¶

Submits a reCAPTCHA request for verification. Returns RecaptchaResponse for the request

recaptcha_response – The value of recaptcha_response
